item.description: Welcome to the of-mu.org Site This is my new “about me” site. It’s hosted on an Arch Linux system using Nginx, Hugo, and a theme named Nix. The domain itself, of-mu.org, is registered via Gandi.net which is a wonderful domain registrar and the only place I will register my personal domains. Gandi has the same policy I do - no bullshit. Notes about Site Certificates Some of you web savvy folks out there may have noticed a green lock in the address bar of your browser indicating that this site is “secure” (or certain definitions thereof) - in other words, it has SSL (technically TLS) enabled.
